apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the kiss emoji between a man and a person with medium-dark to medium skin tones is depicted with tender intimacy, the figures' faces angled towards each other. Apple's signature glossy 3D shading and realistic lighting lend a warm, affectionate glow to the scene, highlighting the emotional connection. This emoji, with its smooth gradients and subtle detail, powerfully expresses romance, deep care, or a passionate farewell with a distinctly Apple touch.
